```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
uk_la <- st_read("possible_topics/geo data/Local_Authority_Districts__December_2017__Boundaries_GB_BSC.shp") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  st_transform(32617)
```
```{r}
scot_la_geo <- uk_la %>% 
  filter(str_detect(lad17cd, "^S12"))
```

```{r}
plot(scot_la_geo)

ggplot(data = scot_la_geo, aes(fill = lad17nm)) + 
  geom_sf() +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}
sf_cent <- st_centroid(scot_la_geo)

ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = scot_la_geo, fill = 'white') +
  geom_sf(data = sf_cent, color = 'red')
```
